subject: Re: [junit] successCausesExitCodeOf0 error on new 4.1 install
msgSnippet: Hi, If I remember correctly, this is due to the test in question being platform-dependent. I also think there s a fix committed to the HEAD branch already.
messageBody:
Hi,

If I remember correctly, this is due to the test in question being
platform-dependent. I also think there's a fix committed to the HEAD branch
already. You're not running on Windows, are you?

Lasse

On 11/30/06, jacoblozano <jacoblozano@...> wrote:
>
> I have run the test of my newly installed junit 4.1 and I receive the
> output below. There is 1 error.
>
> A poster to testdriven.com posted a similar issue here:
>
> http://www.testdriven.com/modules/newbb/viewtopic.php?viewmode=flat&topic_id=4014&forum=7
>
> I am willing to set the breakpoint as the poster who responded to the
> above message suggested. Can anyone point me in the right direction on
> how to do this on the command line and which tools I should use to do it?
>
> Thanks, Jacob
>
> --------------------------------------------
>
> $ java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests
> JUnit version 4.1
